name: Surmount The Summit
description:
Climb The Mountain to Defeat the Boss at the Summit!

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W - Jump

Arrow Keys - Shoot

Hold jump to jump higher and fall slower. The Gun propels you, shoot down to increase jump. Jump into a wall to latch on, then jump again with W.

Once you reach the boss you can practice against it again from the start, though victory only counts if you reach the summit first.
